lead_paragraph: RAILROAD ACCIDENT.--An accident occurred on the canal Road on Saturday, by which a man has probably been killed through his carelessness. When the morning train left the Mount Carmel Station, a man took his stand upon the steps of the last car, probably for the purpose of catching a ride without paying.
